name: Car Driving School-The Academy
description:
Car Driving School is an unique car driving simulator in which you will learn how to drive. in this game you will learn the basics of driving.

Car Driving School contains different levels in which you will learn different sign board and you have to learn the meaning and follow those traffic signals/rules.

If you are failed in following the traffic rules then you will not eligible to complete that levels and can't go further in next level.

Features:
-8 Different signs
-Car Learning
-Beautiful cars to drive
-Realistic Physics
-Beautiful environment

So what are you waiting for, download it as free.
